Examines USE preference order.

USE=xxxxx  (a=on, b=off, x=unset)
    ^----- /etc/portage/package.use
     ^---- /etc/make.conf
      ^--- profile/package.use
       ^-- profile/make.defaults
        ^- .ebuild IUSE

>>> etc/portage/make.profile -> ../../overlay/profiles/default

>>> etc/portage/package.use
pkg/x  aaaaa  aaaax  aaaba  aaabx  aaaxa  aaaxx
pkg/x  aabaa  aabax  aabba  aabbx  aabxa  aabxx
pkg/x  aaxaa  aaxax  aaxba  aaxbx  aaxxa  aaxxx
pkg/x  abaaa  abaax  ababa  ababx  abaxa  abaxx
pkg/x  abbaa  abbax  abbba  abbbx  abbxa  abbxx
pkg/x  abxaa  abxax  abxba  abxbx  abxxa  abxxx
pkg/x  axaaa  axaax  axaba  axabx  axaxa  axaxx
pkg/x  axbaa  axbax  axbba  axbbx  axbxa  axbxx
pkg/x  axxaa  axxax  axxba  axxbx  axxxa  axxxx
pkg/x -baaaa -baaax -baaba -baabx -baaxa -baaxx
pkg/x -babaa -babax -babba -babbx -babxa -babxx
pkg/x -baxaa -baxax -baxba -baxbx -baxxa -baxxx
pkg/x -bbaaa -bbaax -bbaba -bbabx -bbaxa -bbaxx
pkg/x -bbbaa -bbbax -bbbba -bbbbx -bbbxa -bbbxx
pkg/x -bbxaa -bbxax -bbxba -bbxbx -bbxxa -bbxxx
pkg/x -bxaaa -bxaax -bxaba -bxabx -bxaxa -bxaxx
pkg/x -bxbaa -bxbax -bxbba -bxbbx -bxbxa -bxbxx
pkg/x -bxxaa -bxxax -bxxba -bxxbx -bxxxa -bxxxx

>>> etc/make.conf.custom
USE=""
USE="$USE  aaaaa  aaaax  aaaba  aaabx  aaaxa  aaaxx"
USE="$USE  aabaa  aabax  aabba  aabbx  aabxa  aabxx"
USE="$USE  aaxaa  aaxax  aaxba  aaxbx  aaxxa  aaxxx"
USE="$USE -abaaa -abaax -ababa -ababx -abaxa -abaxx"
USE="$USE -abbaa -abbax -abbba -abbbx -abbxa -abbxx"
USE="$USE -abxaa -abxax -abxba -abxbx -abxxa -abxxx"
USE="$USE  baaaa  baaax  baaba  baabx  baaxa  baaxx"
USE="$USE  babaa  babax  babba  babbx  babxa  babxx"
USE="$USE  baxaa  baxax  baxba  baxbx  baxxa  baxxx"
USE="$USE -bbaaa -bbaax -bbaba -bbabx -bbaxa -bbaxx"
USE="$USE -bbbaa -bbbax -bbbba -bbbbx -bbbxa -bbbxx"
USE="$USE -bbxaa -bbxax -bbxba -bbxbx -bbxxa -bbxxx"
USE="$USE  xaaaa  xaaax  xaaba  xaabx  xaaxa  xaaxx"
USE="$USE  xabaa  xabax  xabba  xabbx  xabxa  xabxx"
USE="$USE  xaxaa  xaxax  xaxba  xaxbx  xaxxa  xaxxx"
USE="$USE -xbaaa -xbaax -xbaba -xbabx -xbaxa -xbaxx"
USE="$USE -xbbaa -xbbax -xbbba -xbbbx -xbbxa -xbbxx"
USE="$USE -xbxaa -xbxax -xbxba -xbxbx -xbxxa -xbxxx"

>>> overlay/profiles/default/package.use
pkg/x  aaaaa  aaaax  aaaba  aaabx  aaaxa  aaaxx
pkg/x -aabaa -aabax -aabba -aabbx -aabxa -aabxx
pkg/x  abaaa  abaax  ababa  ababx  abaxa  abaxx
pkg/x -abbaa -abbax -abbba -abbbx -abbxa -abbxx
pkg/x  axaaa  axaax  axaba  axabx  axaxa  axaxx
pkg/x -axbaa -axbax -axbba -axbbx -axbxa -axbxx
pkg/x  baaaa  baaax  baaba  baabx  baaxa  baaxx
pkg/x -babaa -babax -babba -babbx -babxa -babxx
pkg/x  bbaaa  bbaax  bbaba  bbabx  bbaxa  bbaxx
pkg/x -bbbaa -bbbax -bbbba -bbbbx -bbbxa -bbbxx
pkg/x  bxaaa  bxaax  bxaba  bxabx  bxaxa  bxaxx
pkg/x -bxbaa -bxbax -bxbba -bxbbx -bxbxa -bxbxx
pkg/x  xaaaa  xaaax  xaaba  xaabx  xaaxa  xaaxx
pkg/x -xabaa -xabax -xabba -xabbx -xabxa -xabxx
pkg/x  xbaaa  xbaax  xbaba  xbabx  xbaxa  xbaxx
pkg/x -xbbaa -xbbax -xbbba -xbbbx -xbbxa -xbbxx
pkg/x  xxaaa  xxaax  xxaba  xxabx  xxaxa  xxaxx
pkg/x -xxbaa -xxbax -xxbba -xxbbx -xxbxa -xxbxx

>>> overlay/profiles/default/make.defaults
USE=""
USE="$USE aaaaa aaaax -aaaba -aaabx"
USE="$USE aabaa aabax -aabba -aabbx"
USE="$USE aaxaa aaxax -aaxba -aaxbx"
USE="$USE abaaa abaax -ababa -ababx"
USE="$USE abbaa abbax -abbba -abbbx"
USE="$USE abxaa abxax -abxba -abxbx"
USE="$USE axaaa axaax -axaba -axabx"
USE="$USE axbaa axbax -axbba -axbbx"
USE="$USE axxaa axxax -axxba -axxbx"
USE="$USE baaaa baaax -baaba -baabx"
USE="$USE babaa babax -babba -babbx"
USE="$USE baxaa baxax -baxba -baxbx"
USE="$USE bbaaa bbaax -bbaba -bbabx"
USE="$USE bbbaa bbbax -bbbba -bbbbx"
USE="$USE bbxaa bbxax -bbxba -bbxbx"
USE="$USE bxaaa bxaax -bxaba -bxabx"
USE="$USE bxbaa bxbax -bxbba -bxbbx"
USE="$USE bxxaa bxxax -bxxba -bxxbx"
USE="$USE xaaaa xaaax -xaaba -xaabx"
USE="$USE xabaa xabax -xabba -xabbx"
USE="$USE xaxaa xaxax -xaxba -xaxbx"
USE="$USE xbaaa xbaax -xbaba -xbabx"
USE="$USE xbbaa xbbax -xbbba -xbbbx"
USE="$USE xbxaa xbxax -xbxba -xbxbx"
USE="$USE xxaaa xxaax -xxaba -xxabx"
USE="$USE xxbaa xxbax -xxbba -xxbbx"
USE="$USE xxxaa xxxax -xxxba -xxxbx"

>>> overlay/profiles/categories
pkg

>>> overlay/pkg/x/x-1.ebuild
EAPI=7
SLOT=0
KEYWORDS="*"
IUSE="$IUSE +aaaaa aaaax +aaaba aaabx +aaaxa aaaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +aabaa aabax +aabba aabbx +aabxa aabxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +aaxaa aaxax +aaxba aaxbx +aaxxa aaxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +abaaa abaax +ababa ababx +abaxa abaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +abbaa abbax +abbba abbbx +abbxa abbxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +abxaa abxax +abxba abxbx +abxxa abxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +axaaa axaax +axaba axabx +axaxa axaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +axbaa axbax +axbba axbbx +axbxa axbxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +axxaa axxax +axxba axxbx +axxxa axxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +baaaa baaax +baaba baabx +baaxa baaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +babaa babax +babba babbx +babxa babxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +baxaa baxax +baxba baxbx +baxxa baxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +bbaaa bbaax +bbaba bbabx +bbaxa bbaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +bbbaa bbbax +bbbba bbbbx +bbbxa bbbxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +bbxaa bbxax +bbxba bbxbx +bbxxa bbxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +bxaaa bxaax +bxaba bxabx +bxaxa bxaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +bxbaa bxbax +bxbba bxbbx +bxbxa bxbxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +bxxaa bxxax +bxxba bxxbx +bxxxa bxxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xaaaa xaaax +xaaba xaabx +xaaxa xaaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xabaa xabax +xabba xabbx +xabxa xabxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xaxaa xaxax +xaxba xaxbx +xaxxa xaxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xbaaa xbaax +xbaba xbabx +xbaxa xbaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xbbaa xbbax +xbbba xbbbx +xbbxa xbbxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xbxaa xbxax +xbxba xbxbx +xbxxa xbxxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xxaaa xxaax +xxaba xxabx +xxaxa xxaxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xxbaa xxbax +xxbba xxbbx +xxbxa xxbxx"
IUSE="$IUSE +xxxaa xxxax +xxxba xxxbx +xxxxa xxxxx"

>>> expect.use
pkg/x  aaaaa  aaaax  aaaba  aaabx  aaaxa  aaaxx
pkg/x  aabaa  aabax  aabba  aabbx  aabxa  aabxx
pkg/x  aaxaa  aaxax  aaxba  aaxbx  aaxxa  aaxxx
pkg/x  abaaa  abaax  ababa  ababx  abaxa  abaxx
pkg/x  abbaa  abbax  abbba  abbbx  abbxa  abbxx
pkg/x  abxaa  abxax  abxba  abxbx  abxxa  abxxx
pkg/x  axaaa  axaax  axaba  axabx  axaxa  axaxx
pkg/x  axbaa  axbax  axbba  axbbx  axbxa  axbxx
pkg/x  axxaa  axxax  axxba  axxbx  axxxa  axxxx
pkg/x -baaaa -baaax -baaba -baabx -baaxa -baaxx
pkg/x -babaa -babax -babba -babbx -babxa -babxx
pkg/x -baxaa -baxax -baxba -baxbx -baxxa -baxxx
pkg/x -bbaaa -bbaax -bbaba -bbabx -bbaxa -bbaxx
pkg/x -bbbaa -bbbax -bbbba -bbbbx -bbbxa -bbbxx
pkg/x -bbxaa -bbxax -bbxba -bbxbx -bbxxa -bbxxx
pkg/x -bxaaa -bxaax -bxaba -bxabx -bxaxa -bxaxx
pkg/x -bxbaa -bxbax -bxbba -bxbbx -bxbxa -bxbxx
pkg/x -bxxaa -bxxax -bxxba -bxxbx -bxxxa -bxxxx
pkg/x  xaaaa  xaaax  xaaba  xaabx  xaaxa  xaaxx
pkg/x  xabaa  xabax  xabba  xabbx  xabxa  xabxx
pkg/x  xaxaa  xaxax  xaxba  xaxbx  xaxxa  xaxxx
pkg/x -xbaaa -xbaax -xbaba -xbabx -xbaxa -xbaxx
pkg/x -xbbaa -xbbax -xbbba -xbbbx -xbbxa -xbbxx
pkg/x -xbxaa -xbxax -xbxba -xbxbx -xbxxa -xbxxx
pkg/x  xxaaa  xxaax  xxaba  xxabx  xxaxa  xxaxx
pkg/x -xxbaa -xxbax -xxbba -xxbbx -xxbxa -xxbxx
pkg/x  xxxaa  xxxax -xxxba -xxxbx  xxxxa -xxxxx
